snippet: At the National Association of Broadcasters convention in Las Vegas, the F.C.C. chairman reaffirmed his support for requiring that the information be made available online; two commissioners, however, appeared open to compromise.
abstract: At the National Association of Broadcasters convention in Las Vegas, the F.C.C. chairman reaffirmed his support for requiring that the information be made available online; two commissioners, however, appeared open to compromise.

headline.main: New Jockeying Over Online Release of Data on Political Ads
